name: Thorvald
title: Warden of Jotunheim
description: Warden of Jotunheim in Frostgard. Broad, fur-clad, and perpetually reading reports he doesn't like. His jaw stays tight because if he relaxed it, he might say what he actually thinks — and that wouldn't help anyone.
descriptiones: Guardián de Jotunheim en Frostgard. Ancho, cubierto de pieles, y perpetuamente leyendo informes que no le gustan. Mantiene la mandíbula apretada porque si la relajara, podría decir lo que realmente piensa — y eso no ayudaría a nadie.
